txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Make warming winter stew for the refugees ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled cook such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by making warming winter stew for them.

'Rumour has it that you are something of an experienced cook, [placeholder]. Would you be willing to make something to warm the bellies of those who go hungry in Forlaw?\n\n'Not all refugees have been having an easy time getting their hands on food since losing their homes.'
You have been given the recipe for a warming winter stew.\n\nYou should make a warming winter stew to feed the refugees for Wildermore.
'This smells wonderful, [placeholder]! I wish I could eat it myself... but I will see that it gets into the right hands.\n\n'You have my thanks, good [placeholder].'
Deliver the warming winter stew to Hildeleth
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have made warming winter stew and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
